page.title: 15Housing
page.content:
In Sale alone there about 25000 houses and the population is 43000. Most of these houses are semi-detached or detached houses. The only terraced houses are old ones. This is how we found out. We did a survey in four classes of our school. We asked what kind of houses they lived in. Out of 137 children, 77 lived in semi-detached, 53 lived in detached and only 7 lived in terraced houses. Out of all those scores we worked out the percentage of what kind of house they lived in. That means 56% lived in semi-detached, 39% lived in detached and 5% in
terraced houses. In just our class 65% lived in semi -detached, 32% lived in detached and 3% lived in terraced.
